setInfo.name: Destined Rivals
setInfo.description: Special subset featuring TAG TEAM Pokemon and popular cards

attacks.name: Pollen Hazard
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned, Confused, and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Solar Beam GX
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 50 more damage, and your opponent's Active Pokémon is Knocked Out. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Tropical Swing
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Paradise GX
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Jet Punch
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Elegant Sole GX
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Calamitous Slash
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

attacks.name: GG End GX
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 50 more damage, and you take 1 more Prize card. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Perfection
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 5 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Miracle Twin GX
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, choose a different type of basic Energy card from your discard pile and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), take 1 more Prize card. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Cross Division GX
attacks.text: Put 10 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), put 8 more damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Dark Moon GX
attacks.text: You may put 4 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), put 12 damage counters instead of 4. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Greedy Crush
attacks.text: Before doing damage, discard all Trainer cards from your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Gigafall GX
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 100 more damage. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Ditch and Shake
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thrash About GX
attacks.text: This Pokémon is now Confused. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Towering Splash GX
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 30 damage instead of 10. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Red & Blue
cards.text: Discard your hand and draw 6 cards. If you played Red's Challenge during your last turn, draw 2 more cards.

cards.name: Misty & Lorelei
cards.text: Draw 3 cards. If you have any Water Pokémon in play, draw 3 more cards.

cards.name: Sabrina's Suggestion
cards.text: Draw 4 cards. If you have any Psychic Pokémon in play, your opponent reveals their hand.

cards.name: Koga's Trap
cards.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned. If you have any Darkness Pokémon in play, that Pokémon is also Paralyzed.

cards.name: Giovanni's Exile
cards.text: Discard the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck. If both cards are Pokémon, this attack does 80 more damage.
